name: simple-sql-profiler
description: Fast, lightweight, and modern desktop SQL Profiler
author: Cristian Militaru

scripts.release:verify: npm run build && cargo check --manifest-path src-tauri/Cargo.toml
scripts.release:check-versions: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8')).version; const tauri = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('src-tauri/tauri.conf.json', 'utf8')).version; if (pkg !== tauri) { console.error(`Version mismatch: package.json=${pkg}, src-tauri/tauri.conf.json=${tauri}`); process.exit(1); } console.log(`Version OK: ${pkg}`);"
scripts.release:local: npm run release:check-versions && npm run release:verify && npm run tauri -- build
scripts.release: npm run release:check-versions && node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const fs = require('fs'); const v = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8')).version; execSync('git tag v' + v, { stdio: 'inherit' }); execSync('git push origin v' + v, { stdio: 'inherit' });"
